definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: loom (v. GFM:POS Oct.1889)—[[אֶרֶג]] Ju Jdg 16:4 hand-loom to which Samson's hair was fastened, plucked up by him (´[[א]] obj. of [[וַיִּסַּע]]; del. [[הַיְתַד]] as gloss, cf. GFM supr.); Job 7:6 [[יׇמַי קַלּוּ מִנִּי אָָרֶג]] my days are swifter than a loom.
